title: House of the Ancient Hunt
description: A well-appointed atrium house with Fourth Style wall paintings (VII,4,48).
names: Domus of Marius and of the Marii

properties.description: Representative location based on an OpenStreetMap node within the ruins of the so-called Casa della caccia antica (House of the Ancient Hunt) in the archaeological site of Pompeii.
properties.title: OSM location of the so-called "Casa della caccia antica"
